items.answer: It depends on project size ‚Äì a simpler web application takes 4-8 weeks, while a complex enterprise system can take 3-6 months. We always agree on deadlines in the quote.

items.question: Can you integrate with existing systems?
items.answer: Yes! We regularly integrate with ERPs, CRMs, invoicing systems and other external APIs. This is one of the biggest advantages of custom development.

items.question: Who owns the source code?
items.answer: After the project, the source code becomes your complete property ‚Äì no hidden license fees or dependencies.

items.question: What about maintenance and further development?
items.answer: We provide support after delivery: bug fixes, updates, further development ‚Äì with optional monthly or one-time solutions.

items.question: What warranty do we get on the application?
items.answer: There's a 6-month warranty on bugs after delivery ‚Äì we fix all functional problems free of charge during this period.
